
# About the project


Introduction to Open Data Science is a course for eveyrone willing to learn how to use RStudio, R Markdown and GitHub (state-of-the-art tools of data science) to visualise and analyse open data with multivariate statistical methods following principles and practices of reproducible research. For more information, see THINK OPEN blog by Kimmo Vehkalahti at https://blogs.helsinki.fi/thinkopen/welcome-open-data-science/
